page.mod_title: Course Introduction and CHK Search Overview

text_content.paragraph: This course is designed to make your learning experience interactive, engaging, and meaningful. It includes a variety of different interactions, including selectable elements, audio narration, and slideshows. page.prompt: CLICK THE HIGHLIGHTED TEXT TO LEARN MORE. THEN CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

popText.paragraph: Selecting the highlighted text will launch a popup box like this one with more information about the topic. Even though you may know the meaning of a word in bold text, it is important to click on it because much more information may be included in the popup box than a simple definition. For example, the popup may contain a table or graphic that can help clarify a concept.
